pr_title: AF-2423: DebugTest.testObjectId rise an error OutOfMemoryError: Java …

timeline.bodyText:
formatting should be num = Math.abs(num);. Even more, from my point of view it would be better not to change value of the method input parameter and just rewrite the line in cycle int chunk = (int) (Math.abs(num) & 0xf);
WDYT?
timeline.author: jomarko

replies.bodyText:
Thanks @jomarko , formatting change is done.
Since method uses input parameter as variable and we need to change at multiple lines.
or else we need to assign input parameter to a new variable and use it.
i have added new variable and updated the code. Plz review it
replies.author: nibub17

timeline.message:
squash the comits to one , fixed object id  test failure and added new two new tests
